title: Menal Manadhil Female Lyrics Ok Kanmani Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Ok Kanmani  Mental Manadhil (Female)
Lyrics: A. R. Rahman, Mani Ratnam
Singer:Jonita Gandhi

Mana mana mana
 mental manadhil.
lakka lakka lakka
pollaa vayadhil.
takka takka takka
kottum isaiyil
ok en kalvanin madiyil

Naettru enbadhu indrillai
naalai ninaippae
oh thollai.
like-a like your laila laila
indru mattum
king and queen-ah

Mana mana mana
 mental manadhil
lakka lakka lakka
pollaaavayadhil
takka takka takka
kottum isaiyil
ok en kalvanin madiyil

like-a like-a my laila
like-a like-a your laila

prindhaalum pirivomey
puriyaamal inaivomey
sila neram sirippomey
pala neram parappomey

takka takka takka
